ai-snp1.11:1.3_0: She stands in the mountain top,
ai-snp1.11:2.2_0: like a turmoil, covered in mud,
ai-snp1.11:2.3_0: His body is concealed on the ground,
ai-snp1.11:3.2_0: the cloth from Payāga or cloth,
ai-snp1.11:3.4_0: And whom does so farmer and.
ai-snp1.11:4.1_0: Go on to a hollow spit,
ai-snp1.11:6.1_0: Children provide you no as it
ai-snp1.11:6.2_0: eating and drinking in the mouth,
ai-snp1.11:7.2_0: and filled with a stick to the nose.
ai-snp1.11:8.1_0: But when the dead monk sleeps badly,
ai-snp1.11:9.4_0: and others who come to anyone:
ai-snp1.11:10.4_0: just as they see the truths.
ai-snp1.11:11.1_0: As this is, so is that;
ai-snp1.11:11.2_0: as this is, so is that;
ai-snp1.11:11.4_0: For the act of desire for the body.
ai-snp1.11:13.1_0: This two-legged body is dirty and stinking,
ai-snp1.11:13.3_0: and oozing all over the place—
ai-snp1.11:14.2_0: it seems to me like the deluge.
ai-snp1.11:14.4_0: Why don’t I desire to be reborn?
